frame.name: Ambient_temperature
frame.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Temperature</fen> in a certain environment, determined by <fen>Time</fen> and <fen>Place</fen>, is specified.
<ex>It's <fex name="deg">too</fex> <t>hot</t> <fex name="deg">to do anything</fex> <fex name="tim">today</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="pl">Nome</fex> <m>is</m> <fex name="deg">pretty</fex> <t>cold</t> <fex name="tim">this time of year</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="tim">Last Tuesday</fex> <m>was</m> a <fex name="deg">real</fex> <t>scorcher</t>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="tim">Tomorrow</fex> is gonna <m>be</m> <t>chilly</t>.</ex> <ex>I ca n't go out into the <t>cold</t> . <fex name="Place">DNI</fex> <fex name="Time">DNI</fex></ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> where it is a certain <fen>Temperature</fen> .
<ex><fex name="Place">Chicago</fex> is <t>hot</t> today .</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Temperature
FE.definition:
<def-root>A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Temperature</fen> of the environment.
<ex>The <t>temperature</t> was <fex name="tem">85 F</fex> in the shade today</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Temperature</fen> from the norm.
<ex>It's like <fex name="deg">totally</fex> <t>chilly</t>, dude, like, totally.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which an ambient environment has a particular <fen>Temperature</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the ambient <fen>Temperature</fen> is as specified.
<ex>It's plenty <t>cool</t> <fex name="con">in the shade</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Weather
FE.definition:
<def-root>The meteorological conditions which determine the ambient temperature of a locale.
<ex>We get <t>warmer</t> <fex name="Weather">weather</fex> this time of year.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: cool.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having an environment with a fairly low temperature

lexUnit.name: cold.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having an environment with a low temperature

lexUnit.name: hot.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having an environment with a high temperature

lexUnit.name: warm.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having an environment with a fairly or comfortably high temperature

lexUnit.name: scorcher.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a day or period of very hot weather

lexUnit.name: temperature.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the degree of heat of outside air

lexUnit.name: freezing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having an environment with an extremely low temperature.

lexUnit.name: cold.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: low temperature, usually below freezing.
